import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './SystemSettings.css'; // Import CSS const SystemSettings = () => { const [selectedSection, setSelectedSection] = useState('ai-parameters'); // Default section const [notifications, setNotifications] = useState({ email: false, sms: false, push: false, systemAlerts: false, }); const toggleNotification = (type) => { setNotifications((prev) => ({ ...prev, [type]: !prev[type], })); }; return (

); }; export default SystemSettings;
